name: European Policy Institute for Development and Innovation in Education
goal:
The aims of the Association are:

- to promote improving the quality of education;
- to stimulate critical analysis of public policies of education;
- to encourage developing evidence-based policies and initiatives;
- to contribute to development of policies that promote equal educational opportunities, particularly in access and completion of education;
- to enhance the participation of stakeholders as well as society as a whole, in designing strategies and policies in education;
- to further advance innovative pedagogies and student centred learning;
- to defend the values of institutional autonomy, academic freedom, respect for human rights, as well as ethical integrity and professional in education;
- to foster social responsibility of educational institutions and all stakeholders in education and training;
- to assist the debate on international initiatives relating to education;
- to boost cooperation and recognition between education systems by implementing the agreements reached at European level.
interests: Budget, Education, Enlargement, Home Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Youth
